#Checkbox - элемент формы

##Files

* [checkbox.css](../../public/css/checkbox.css)

##Template for PHPStorm

```
<div class="dhrtCheckbox">
    <label>
         <input type="checkbox" class="dhrtCheckbox-noView" name="$name$" value="$name$">
         <span class="dhrtCheckboxView"></span>
         <span>$name$</span>
    </label>
</div>
```
